text: mariyu miru mi strilaku (modati sari leka rendavasari) vidakuliste, varu tama niriksana vyavadhini (iddat nu) purti cesina taruvata, tama (modati) bhartalanu dharmasam'matanga paraspara angikaranto vivaham cesukodaliste, miru varini atankaparacakandi. Milo evariki allah yandu mariyu antima dinamu nandu visvasamundo, variki i bodhana ceyabadutondi. Idi miku niskalankamainadi mariyu nirmalamainadi. Mariyu allah ku anta telusu, kani miku emi teliyadu
